title: New: Jackie Stabb â€“ Night Talks
content:
Photo: Steven King

Having taken a trip to LA earlier in the year, Jackie Stabb aka CitR favourite Chelsea Burgin has offered up new track Night Talks as the first cut from the recording sessions.

Perhaps cleaner and certainly more chorus orientated than her previous endeavours, it certainly feels like a natural musical development, reminding me of a softer Yeah Yeah Yeahs, or in part like the more accessible moments of Broken Social Scene. Check out Night Talks below, taken from her forthcoming EP, and keep up with Jackie Stabb over at Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
